selected_skills.name: extract_numerical_values_from_image
selected_skills.purpose: Extract numerical values from the table image to identify values associated with the 'Ruling Group'.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to extract the values 10, 15, and 20 from the table image.

selected_skills.name: calc_numeric
selected_skills.purpose: Calculate the sum of the extracted numerical values.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to sum the values 10, 15, and 20 to get the total for the 'Ruling Group'.

selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: Format the final answer for presentation.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to format the sum as 'Answer: ...'.
